steps.title: Start application's topology creation
steps.content: From this tab you will be ablme to search and filter components you want to build your application's topology.

steps.title: Choose application's components
steps.content: Here you can see listed all available components in Alien 4 Cloud. To pick a component, first select a version and then just drag and drop it into the main central view and the topology graph will appear.

steps.title: Properties and component's details
steps.content: Selecting a component in this topology graph the tab Properties will be actived displaying component's informations.
